title: LoLReplay HELP
body: I am having some prolems on replays from LOLReplay, when i try starting a Replay it popups a window saying ''Connection to spectator server failed, Would you like to retry?'' or something like this, Can anybody help?

replies.body: How does it work? can i move camera angle and same i do with LOL Replay?
I used to use LoLReplay, but I'm not sure you can move the camera there. Maybe you could with LSI, but I don't know because I never have tried.
On LOL replay you could, anyway i downloaded it and will try it as soon as possible, Thanks^^
